dmca.title: OFFGAMERS.COM Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: d2items-jesse@mail2.blitzen.net
[mailto:d2items-jesse@mail2.blitzen.net] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 26, 2005 4:08 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: OFFGAMERS.COM Copyright Infringement

I am writing this email in hope that the formal notice required by the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act will be unnecessary.  I am the Chief
Executive Officer of Lewt, Inc., a California company which exclusively owns
the websites located at URL http://www.d2items.com and
http://www.d2legit.com and the content thereof.

        It has come to our attention that the website (the "Infringing
Site") hosted by your company, located at URL:
http://offgamers.com/content.php?id=3 and
http://offgamers.com/content.php?id=6 has content that literally infringes
upon our company's copyright in the information and materials located at
URL: http://www.d2items.com/faq.php and
http://www.d2legit.com/disclaimer.php, respectively.  We have good faith
believe that the use of our copyrighted information and materials by the
Infringing Site has not been authorized by our company, its agent or the
law.

        Demand is hereby made that you immediately remove and/or disable
access to said infringing content.  If you have any questions, please
contact me at the following address and phone number:

Lewt, Inc.
PO Box 5294
Berkeley, CA 94705
USA

Telephone: 510-548-7280
Email: jesse@d2items.com

Jesse Powell
Chief Executive Officer
Lewt, Inc.
